item.title: Traffic Collision and Avoidance System (TCAS) Resolution Advisory (RA) Display System(s) – One Inoperative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative on the non-flying pilot side.

note.para: Pilot with the operative Advisory and Display System must act as Pilot Flying.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "____RESOLUTION ADV SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
